name: Applicable law
text:
PART 4.  EXEMPT PROPERTY AND ALLOWANCES

     This part applies to the estate of a decedent who dies domiciled in this State.  Rights to homestead allowance, exempt property, and family allowance for a decedent who dies not domiciled in this State are governed by the law of the decedent's domicile at death. [L 1996, c 288, pt of §1]
